title: Croatian Football Federation
summary: The Croatian Football Federation (Croatian: Hrvatski nogometni savez, abbr. HNS) is the governing body of association football in Croatia. It was originally formed in 1912 and is based in the capital city of Zagreb. The organisation is a member of both FIFA and UEFA, and is responsible for overseeing all aspects of the game of football in Croatia. Its current president is Marijan KustiÄ‡.[3]
